// frontend/src/components/Settings.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Settings.css'; const Settings = ({ onSettingsChange, isOpen, onToggle }) => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ neutralization: 'Subindustry', decay: 4, truncation: 0.08, pasteurization: 'On', nanHandling: 'Off', maxTrade: 'Off', delay: 1, commission: 0.001, bookSize: 1000000, minWeight: 0.01, maxWeight: 0.05, rebalanceFreq: 'Daily' }); const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { const newSettings = { ...settings, [key]: value }; setSettings(newSettings); onSettingsChange(newSettings); }; const handleApplySettings = async () => { try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/update-settings/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(settings), }); if (response.ok) { const result = await response.json(); console.log('Settings updated successfully:', result); // You could add a success notification here } else { console.error('Failed to update settings'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating settings:', error); } }; if (!isOpen) { return ( ); } return (

Strategy Settings

handleSettingChange('decay', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {settings.decay}
handleSettingChange('truncation', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {(settings.truncation * 100).toFixed(0)}%
handleSettingChange('delay', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {settings.delay}
handleSettingChange('commission', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {(settings.commission * 100).toFixed(2)}%
handleSettingChange('bookSize', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> ${(settings.bookSize / 1000000).toFixed(1)}M
handleSettingChange('minWeight', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {(settings.minWeight * 100).toFixed(1)}%
handleSettingChange('maxWeight', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="slider" /> {(settings.maxWeight * 100).toFixed(0)}%
); }; export default Settings;
